name: Summon Plant Ally
text: You can call plant creatures to your aid in battle.
prerequisites: Knowledge (nature) 1 rank, ability to cast summon nature’s ally spells.
benefit:
When casting a summon nature’s ally spell, you gain access to the list of plant creatures below.

Summon nature’s ally I: Leaf leshy, vegepygmy.
Summon nature’s ally II: Gourd leshy, leaf ray (without seed ability).
Summon nature’s ally III: Fungus leshy, weedwhip.
Summon nature’s ally IV: Assassin vine, seaweed leshy (without air cyst ability).
Summon nature’s ally V: Mandragora, shambling mound.
Summon nature’s ally VI: Tendriculos, treant.
Summon nature’s ally VII: Giant flytrap.
Summon nature’s ally VIII: Jinmenju.
Summon nature’s ally IX: Alraune.
